original: 河東解縣人，蜀漢將領，關興之子、關羽之孫。娶公主為妻，但史書未記載其妻姓名。官至虎賁中郎將。由於關統無後，便以庶子關彝繼承為嗣。
text: Hedong Jie County, general of Shu Han, son of Guan Xing, grandson of Guan Yu. Marry the princess as his wife, but the name of his wife is not recorded in the history books. Official to Tiger Benzhong Lang. As Guan Tong had no descendants, he inherited his son Guan Yi.
